page.title: 05Shopping in Rhos
page.content: The main trading area is in the centre of the village along Market St.There are some newsagents and general stores along some of the other streets.There are two supermarkets which are also in Market St.The shops in Rhos vary from clothes shops to hairdressers.These shops are enough for the people of Rhos,anything else they can go to the town for.The shops are owned, by people living around the area, there are only banks and supermarkets which are owned by large companies. There are also some small businesses which include window cleaners,coal merchants,decorators and joiners. There are also cobblers and sign writers. There are five coal merchants and four window cleaners.
